meanings.definition: The ways in which a particular group of people live and organize their society.
meanings.sent1: The Native American tribe's lifeways included hunting, gathering, and communal living.
meanings.sent2: Studying different lifeways around the world helps us understand diverse cultures.
meanings.sent3: The lifeways of the penguins involved sliding on their bellies for fun.
meanings.sent4: The lifeways of the ants organizing their society were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Learning about lifeways through stories makes history come alive.

meanings.definition: The customs, traditions, and beliefs of a particular culture or community.
meanings.sent1: The lifeways of the ancient Egyptians included mummification and elaborate burial rituals.
meanings.sent2: Respecting the lifeways of others promotes cultural understanding and harmony.
meanings.sent3: The lifeways of the elves involved celebrating the changing seasons with magical ceremonies.
meanings.sent4: The lifeways of the nomadic tribe were like a tapestry woven with stories and rituals.
meanings.sent5: Experiencing different lifeways firsthand enriches our perspective on the world.
